meanings.definition: A person who intercedes on behalf of another; an advocate or helper.
meanings.sent1: The paracletes at the charity organization work tirelessly to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: My friend is always there for me, like a paracletes whenever I face a problem.
meanings.sent3: The paracletes in the office always has a solution to every printer problem.
meanings.sent4: She acted as a paracletes, guiding me through the difficult decision-making process.
meanings.sent5: The paracletes in the story was a beacon of hope for the lost travelers.

meanings.definition: A title given to the Holy Spirit in Christian theology.
meanings.sent1: During the church service, the priest spoke about the significance of the paracletes.
meanings.sent2: The paracletes is believed to provide comfort and guidance to believers.
meanings.sent3: The paracletes seemed to be working overtime during the busy holiday season.
meanings.sent4: In times of trouble, many turn to the paracletes for strength and wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The paracletes is seen as a divine presence in the lives of Christians.
